#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
int main()
{
	int i,t,n,num,val,flag,m;
	ll ans;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		ans=0;
		flag=1;
		scanf("%d%d",&n,&m);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			scanf("%d",&num);
			if(i<m)
			{
				ans+=num;
			}
			else
			{
				if(num%2)
					val=num/2+1;
				else
					val=num/2;
				ans-=val;
				if((ans<=0)&&(i!=n-1))
				{
					flag=0;
				}	
			}
		}
		if(flag)
			printf("VICTORY\n");
		else
			printf("DEFEAT\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
